fullText: Jake Gyllenhaal and Ruth Wilson bring star power and serious acting chops to Nick Payne's romantic drama about parallel universes and the infinite possibilities of love.

rejectionReasoning: claude: This appears to be a brief promotional description or headline rather than an actual review with critical evaluation of the production.; openai: This text is a brief statement about the actors and the play's theme, lacking evaluative content or a verdict.
